metadata.synopsis: This guards gets spawned along with Counselor Florrick's executed body to keep an eye on it. Clearly didn't approve of the execution.
metadata.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_A, LOW, teleport to S_LOW_BasiliskGate_FlorrickHangedSpot_343dfb1c-7175-42c6-bca7-dc53cc46c617, set flag LOW_BasiliskGate_State_FlorrickExecutionKnown_aff10649-cfc1-b6d0-0984-5572383cda0a, longrest several times (currently 5x) unitl Florrick gets executed. This guard is spawned on the gallows. Talk to them.

0.speaker: Fist Anderson
0.text: Hah - I'll be fired for this. No loss, considering I was quitting. Maybe this is a push from the gods.
0.context: NodeContext: bitter laugh - considers it serendipity

1.speaker: Fist Anderson
1.text: I've met Counsellor Florrick - she didn't deserve this. Not one bit.
1.context: NodeContext: bitter - clearly doesn't agree with the execution

2.speaker: Fist Anderson
2.text: Be glad you missed the execution. It's a mercy when their necks snap...
2.context: NodeContext: bitter - clearly doesn't agree with the execution

3.speaker: Fist Anderson
3.text: This execution was a farce, Counsellor Florrick didn't - wait. Where's her body?!
3.context: NodeContext: bitter - clearly doesn't agree with the execution, then noticing her body is gone
